services.title: We specialise in crafting beautiful, high quality marketing pages.
services.summary: As long as those opportunities involve giving us money to re-purpose old projects — we can come up with an endless number of those.

web-development.title: Web Development
web-development.description: We build custom websites and web applications that are tailored to your business needs. We use the latest technologies to ensure that your website is fast, secure, and easy to use.

ai-automation.title: AI Automation
ai-automation.description: We automate your business processes using AI. We use the latest technologies to ensure that your AI automation is fast, secure, and easy to use.

e-commerce.title: E-Commerce
e-commerce.description: We are at the forefront of modern e-commerce development. Which mainly means adding your logo to the Shopify store template we’ve used for the past six years.

custom-content-management.title: Custom Content Management
custom-content-management.description: We build custom content management systems that are tailored to your business needs. We use the latest technologies to ensure that your content management system is fast, secure, and easy to use.

case-studies.title: Proven solutions for real-world problems.
case-studies.summary: We believe in efficiency and maximizing our resources to provide the best value to our clients. The primary way we do that is by re-using the same five projects we've been developing for the past decade.

ProcessPage.title: Our Process
ProcessPage.intro: During the rapidly changing times of AI, we're here to help you navigate the digital landscape.

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: We work closely with our clients to understand their needs and goals, embedding ourselves in their every day operations to understand what makes their business tick.

build.title: Build
build.description: Based off of the discovery phase, we develop a comprehensive roadmap for each product and start working towards delivery. The roadmap is an intricately tangled mess of technical nonsense designed to drag the delivery.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: About halfway through the Build phase, we push each project out by 6 weeks due to a change in requirements. This allows us to increase the budget a final time before launch.

values.title: Balancing reliability and innovation
values.description: We strive to stay at the forefront of emerging trends and technologies, while completely ignoring them and forking that old Rails project we feel comfortable using. We stand by our core values to justify that decision.

value-1.title: Meticulous
value-1.description: We are meticulous in our approach to every project. We take the time to understand the client's needs and goals, and we work tirelessly to deliver a product that is not only functional, but also beautiful and easy to use.

value-2.title: Collaborative
value-2.description: We are collaborative in our approach to every project. We work closely with the client to understand their needs and goals, and we work tirelessly to deliver a product that is not only functional, but also beautiful and easy to use.

value-3.title: Innovative
value-3.description: We are innovative in our approach to every project. We are not afraid to try new things, and we are not afraid to fail. We are always looking for new ways to improve our products and services.
